titles: The proposal for sending back the nobility and gentry of Ireland together with a vindication of the same, and an answer to the objections made against it in a letter to a gentleman of Ireland.
author: Buckley, Richard, Sir.
publisher: Printed for Samuel Holford ... and sold by R. Baldwin ...,
notes: Written by Richard Buckley.  Cf. BM.

keywords: Ireland --  Economic conditions --  Early works to 1800.
